channel.description: Recent content in Introduction to NCT and L4 support on Technical Documentation

item.title: Docs: Initial Response (IR)
item.description: Once the case is created, it is assigned to the Smart Tier-1 team. The smart T1 engineer sends the Initial response to the customer acknowledging that the ticket has been received and is under analysis.

item.title: Docs: Case Creation
item.description: When a customer raises an issue, a case (ticket) is created with general details.
